data.message:
Always liked your songs, Eminem, but about what Mr Porter said about Brasil:
First of all, Brasil is a country, and not a city.
Second, how disrespectful was that?
Brazilians are warm, polite people, who treat well every tourist, every person who cames here.
And when we are the tourists in your country, we respect it, we dont trash it on the internet.
There is MUCH more in our country than sex.
Our country is beautiful, and culture and our people too.
Maybe because of all the sex we make.
;)
